name: forvo-pronunciation
description: MCP server exposing the Forvo pronunciation API — access 6M+ native speaker audio recordings across 430+ languages
long_description: This MCP Bundle provides access to the Forvo pronunciation API, enabling native speaker pronunciation lookups, audio downloads, word search, and language listing. Designed for integration with Anki flashcard workflows — download base64-encoded audio and attach directly to flashcards. Supports filtering by language, country, speaker sex, and rating.

tools.name: forvo_word_pronunciations
tools.description: Get all available pronunciations for a word with metadata (speaker, country, rating, audio URLs)

tools.name: forvo_standard_pronunciation
tools.description: Get the single best-rated pronunciation for a word

tools.name: forvo_download_pronunciation
tools.description: Download the best pronunciation audio as base64-encoded MP3 for Anki integration

tools.name: forvo_search_words
tools.description: Search for words that have pronunciations available on Forvo

tools.name: forvo_language_list
tools.description: List all available languages with pronunciation counts

forvo_api_key.title: Forvo API Key
forvo_api_key.description: Your Forvo API key. Get one at https://api.forvo.com/plans-and-pricing/

default_language.title: Default Language
default_language.description: Default language code for pronunciation lookups (e.g. 'ja', 'en', 'ru'). See https://forvo.com/languages-codes/
